fields.name: Worship
fields.description: Responsible for Sunday services, music, and worship elements
fields.notes: Includes worship team, tech team, and service planning

fields.name: Children's Ministry
fields.description: Responsible for all children's programming from nursery through elementary
fields.notes: Includes Sunday School, VBS, and special events

fields.name: Youth Ministry
fields.description: Responsible for middle and high school student programming
fields.notes: Includes weekly youth group, retreats, and special events

fields.name: Outreach
fields.description: Responsible for community outreach and missions
fields.notes: Includes local missions, global missions, and evangelism

fields.name: Facilities
fields.description: Responsible for church building and grounds maintenance
fields.notes: Includes cleaning, repairs, and facility improvements

fields.name: Administration
fields.description: Responsible for church operations and administration
fields.notes: Includes office staff, facilities, and operations
